nodes.text: The Listehol Run was hyperlane that connected several systems, near Werncin 3 in the Borderland Regions of the Outer Rim Territories.

Wullf Yularen battled slavers on the Listehol Run in his career in the pre-Clone Wars Republic Navy. Borun Call and Slar-dan ti Gardi were two slavers who were notorious for enslaving sapients along the Listehol Run.
The route was the site of an Imperial campaign shortly after the Declaration of a New Order.
